You asked. We listened. Otter improved:
• Share audio to Otter from other apps (e.g. iOS Files app)
• Tap on a word to playback from there
• Search results jump to actual word positions
• Keep screen on during playback
• Streamlined experience for tagging speakers
• Configurable local audio storage limit
• FAQs in Settings > Get answers

You asked. We listened. Otter improved:
• Share audio to Otter from other apps (e.g. iOS Files app)
• Tap on a word to playback from there
• Search results jump to actual word positions
• Keep screen on during playback
• Streamlined experience for tagging speakers
• Configurable local audio storage limit
• FAQs in Settings > Get answers

You asked. We listened. Otter improved:
• Share audio to Otter from other apps (e.g. iOS Files app)
• Tap on a word to playback from there
• Search results jump to actual word positions
• Keep screen on during playback
• Streamlined experience for tagging speakers
• Configurable local audio storage limit
• FAQs in Settings > Get answers

Your most requested features and enhancements:
• Export audio in mp3 format via the otter.ai website
• Scrolling the text would no longer pause the playback
• Auto-scroll resumes if current word is in view
• Rematch speakers after manually tagging/retagging bubbles
• Edit your profile name

If you enjoy using Otter, please rate the app and write a nice review! Help us spread the word by sharing the app. We'd really appreciate your support and feedback!

- Bug fixes and improvements

- Bug fixes and improvements

• A new, premium plan that includes 6,000 minutes of transcription time per month – 10 times more than the free plan.
• Inline Photos: You can snap photos of a whiteboard, a presenter or other relevant content when recording, and Otter will add them inline as part of your notes.

• A new, premium plan that includes 6,000 minutes of transcription time per month – 10 times more than the free plan.
• Inline Photos: You can snap photos of a whiteboard, a presenter or other relevant content when recording, and Otter will add them inline as part of your notes.

• A new, premium plan that includes 6,000 minutes of transcription time per month – 10 times more than the free plan.
• Inline Photos: You can snap photos of a whiteboard, a presenter or other relevant content when recording, and Otter will add them inline as part of your notes.

• Sync photos taken from Camera app to Otter as inline photos
• Zoom in/out inline photos
• Photo thumbnails as shortcuts to jump into conversations
• Swipe to delete or unshare your group conversations
• Pull down to refresh conversation detail

• Sync events from iOS Calendar to receive reminder notifications to record, and title the conversations automatically
• Exported text can now optionally include speaker names and timestamps
• Adjustable playback speed is now directly on the audio control itself
• Save inline photos to iOS Photos
• View inline photos in landscape mode
• Swipe to delete or leave a group
• Stop recording automatically after 3 hours to avoid wasted minutes

New features & enhancements:
• Export text with new options to select some (or all) segments, share as plain text or file attachment, merge same-speaker segments, and add your own comments
• Limit which calendar events you wish to be reminded to record by choosing a list of keywords in Settings > Notifications
• Peek and pop with 3D Touch to view and listen to conversations in a list
• Face ID / Touch ID lock option for extra privacy protection

Bug fixes & improvements:
• More reliable import of a large number of contacts
• More accurate indication of audio upload status
• Improved notifications and recovery from recording interruptions by phone calls

• Face ID / Touch ID lock option for extra privacy protection

• Export photos (to iOS Photos and other apps)
• Need a quicker way to share, export, or delete multiple conversations at once? Tap on the gray icon on the left to multi-select for bulk actions (not applicable to conversations shared with you).

• Enhanced UI in Conversations, Groups, and Recording screens

• New capabilities to make editing much easier!
   • Edit the entire conversation at once (instead of editing and saving one paragraph at a time)
   • Editable paragraph breaks! Hit backspace to merge with a previous paragraph; hit return to split into a new one.
• Import video (mp4, avi, mov, wmv, mpg) from iOS Files
• More ways to add conversations to a group (hit the blue '+' icon in a group; select "Add to Group" in the 3-dot menu of a conversation)
• [Otter Premium] Skip silence between paragraphs option in the playback speed selector

• iOS 12 support
• Siri Shortcuts to start/stop recording with your voice! Add your custom phrases in iOS Settings > Otter > Siri & Search > Shortcuts.
• Toggle between showing all conversations or just the ones you've recorded/imported in the Conversations tab
• Tap the Conversations tab icon repeatedly to scroll to the next unread conversation
• Faster load time when opening a conversation
• Fix a bug related to the one-tap recording control in Otter's iOS Widget

New features for iOS 13!
• Dark Mode: Otter will run in iOS 13's Dark Mode if you enable it in the iOS Settings app. For iOS 12 and below, you can still turn on Otter’s own Dark Mode under Otter’s Advanced Settings.
• Interactive Shortcuts: You can create a Siri Shortcut that starts an Otter recording, asks you what title to give it, which folder to save in, and which group to share to–all by voice!

New features for iOS 13!
• Dark Mode: Otter will run in iOS 13's Dark Mode if you enable it in the iOS Settings app. For iOS 12 and below, you can still turn on Otter’s own Dark Mode under Otter’s Advanced Settings.
• Interactive Shortcuts: You can create a Siri Shortcut that starts an Otter recording, asks you what title to give it, which folder to save in, and which group to share to–all by voice!

New features for iOS 13!
• Dark Mode: Otter will run in iOS 13's Dark Mode if you enable it in the iOS Settings app. For iOS 12 and below, you can still turn on Otter’s own Dark Mode under Otter’s Advanced Settings.
• Interactive Shortcuts: You can create a Siri Shortcut that starts an Otter recording, asks you what title to give it, which folder to save in, and which group to share to–all by voice!

• Live Video Meeting Notes, a new feature in the Otter for Teams plan, enables Zoom meeting hosts to provide live transcription and collaborative note-taking to all participants, making remote work & learning more accessible and productive.

• Basic Plan still offers free recording and Zoom-syncing up to 600 minutes per month, but now limits each transcription to 40 minutes. Importing is now exclusive to Otter Premium and Teams plans, and we offer Basic Plan users 3 trial imports.

• Upgrade to Otter Premium to transcribe any number of imports, Otter recordings, and synced Zoom recordings, up to 4 hours per transcription and 6000 minutes per month.

To everyone who’s been using Otter for a long time now, thank you!  We’ve included a couple features to make your lives easier:
• If you have a long groups list, Otter will hide the groups that don’t have any recent activity.  You can always access the full list by tapping “Show more.”
• Conversations that you recorded before this year will include a year in their date, for better clarity when scrolling through a list of conversations or search results.

• If you have a long groups list, Otter will hide the groups that don’t have any recent activity.  You can always access the full list by tapping “Show more.”
• Conversations that you recorded before this year will include a year in their date, for better clarity when scrolling through a list of conversations or search results.
